casebody.data:
New York Superior Court

General Term.

Filed November 3, 1890. Eliza W. White et al., Resp’ts, v. Edward W. Benjamin, App’lt. Appeal from order directing defendant to furnish a bill of particulars. Per Curiam.

The order should be affirmed, with ten dollars costs and disbursements.

Freedman and Ingraham, JJ., concur.
